       this worries me, the whole eighth grade 'love triangle' was annoying, so was 'the love tree', and the emily combe kiss was stupid and so was the dance boat cruise. also the 'as you like it' didnt help, and carson c. you making fun of me just made everything worse. my commencment speech went bad now didnt it? and carson l. you dotn have to tell everyone everything, a personal life is sometimes nice. the whole world dosent need to know about what making out sounds like. both carsons made everything worse so do the group good and drop off the face of the earth. by the way, the moment school ends the better. i cant wait to get away from the cursed school. but mabbie thats just me.   on to a new topic, i cant possibly be less gunker, i started the sterotype. dougie and me made it up for me. a gunker a goth + punk + skater + bad dresser = gunker. see no one else can be a gunker because no one else was called a bad dresser at pollys chapel. and for your information, i am not a wanna be gunker. i am not a gunker at all. i am just good at disguising my inner sterotype.   i wonder when the pool will open... Rachel,  do you rememebr when you all used to call me that. and when i spent all my outside lunches with dougie and carson l. we would all sit outside ms. shelhorns door and we would then go to the tralier, i miss the tralier. i think we should have a day when you all call me rachel not sporko. thatd be odd.
